title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: The task description has been revised to include a more detailed breakdown of the functional requirements: (1) Define the range of programming concepts, algorithms, and data structures to be covered - Data Structures: arrays, linked lists, trees, stacks, queues; Algorithms: sorting, searching, graph traversal, dynamic programming, greedy algorithms; Programming Concepts: variables, functions, loops, conditionals, objects, classes, exceptions. (2) Specify the target audience, learning levels (beginner, intermediate, advanced), and desired user experience - interactive tutorials, quizzes, or coding challenges. (3) Determine the integration requirements with external resources or APIs, such as programming language documentation, code repositories, or popular AI platforms for seamless user experiences. Additionally, define the project's scope, objectives, success criteria, and any constraints or assumptions. The revised description also includes considerations for scalability, accessibility, and localization to cater to a global audience. To further enhance the RFC, it would be beneficial to add specific details on how the system will handle multilingual support and accessibility features for visually impaired users - Support for screen readers, text-to-speech, high-contrast modes, compatibility with assistive technologies like magnifiers or braille displays. This could also include subtitles/captions in multiple languages for videos, and compatibility with closed captioning systems. (4) Finally, outline the project timeline with key milestones and deadlines. To ensure a comprehensive review, I suggest adding the following points to the RFC: (a) User interface design - wireframes or mockups of the main screens, menus, and navigation; (b) Performance considerations - expected processing time for different operations, data storage requirements, and server load management; (c) Security measures - authentication, authorization, data encryption, and regular security audits. The RFC is now ready for further refinement and can be reassigned to a Task Decomposer or Project Manager.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components for natural language processing, knowledge base management, interactive example generation, and user interface.

title: Develop Natural Language Processing (NLP) Module
description: Implement the NLP module responsible for understanding user queries, extracting relevant programming concepts, and generating natural language explanations.

title: Build Knowledge Base
description: Create and populate the knowledge base with information about programming concepts, algorithms, and data structures, including their definitions, examples, and related concepts.

title: Develop Interactive Example Generator
description: Implement the module responsible for generating interactive examples and visualizations to illustrate programming concepts and algorithms.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the AIConceptExplainer, including the input interface for user queries, the output interface for displaying explanations and interactive examples, and the overall user experience.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure the system is secure and user data is protected, including input validation, authentication, and authorization mechanisms.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD) Pipeline
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the AIConceptExplainer application.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the AIConceptExplainer, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the application.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
description: Perform user acceptance testing with a representative group of users to validate the functionality, usability, and overall user experience of the AIConceptExplainer.
